description: Builing CRM solutions for business platforms for maintaining the best possible relationship with the customers is something we specialize at in Twinforce Solutions LTD. From transforming business logics to automations, providing websites, creating APIs and integration with external services, we provide the best soltions to businesses

Connecting talented freelancers and remote workers with their best clients is Imbue's goal. We provide milestone based contracts that makes hiring remote workers more reliable and keeping fair salaries to freelancers. Unlike other freelance platforms, Imbue gives you unique features like creating grant and fundraiser, collaborative job hiring, fair competition and anonymous hiring
